p: In silico ADME studies were performed to detect some physicochemical properties, such as lipophilicity, water solubility, and pharmacokinetic properties through the login‐free website http://www.swissadme.ch. 17 Absorption (% ABS) of compounds from intestinal was figured out by: % ABS=109×(0.345xTopological Polar Surface Area (TPSA)). 18
